column26: Indicates hospital with emergency station open 7/24.orMeans only presence of hospital, rest home, or the like. Is an educated indication to be quiet and to drive carefully.

column16: orIn the Netherlands, the first one is always used because otherwise it wouldn't be an official bus stop. The bottom one is sometimes used to inform drivers a bus stop is coming up, mostly outside the built-up area.

column26: This sign (no. 4.07) is produced at the beginning of a tunnel, if accompanied with sign no. 5.03 (length indication), it indicates the length of the tunnel, not the distance to the tunnel, as done by sign no. 4.07a!
